name: Thunderbolt Swimming Pool
description: Thunderbolt Swimming Pool is a premier swimming pool center in the Lalitpur area with top-notch facilities and friendly staff to make your experience enjoyable and memorable.

name: Satdobato swimming pool
description: Satdobato Swimming Pool is the perfect destination for a refreshing swim at an affordable price. Located in the heart of Lalitpur, our premier facility boasts top-notch amenities and friendly staff to ensure a memorable experience for all our guests.

name: Refresh swimming pool
description: Refresh Swimming Pool offers a serene oasis in the heart of Lalitpur. Our state-of-the-art facility boasts top-notch amenities and a welcoming atmosphere, making it the perfect destination for a refreshing swim or a relaxing day by the pool. At an affordable price, our friendly staff ensures a memorable experience for all our guests.
